transcript:

Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, vah anya call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay pashchat prayas karein.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Ji IndiaMART se baat kar raha hai manager baat kar raha tha idhar IndiaMART se.

Customer: Sir mera kaam nahi ho raha mere se thagi hui hai ye wali IndiaMART ne thagi ki mere sath March ke mahine se maine shuru kiya hai aaj tak main inko samjhata aa raha hu ki mere keyword laga do fuel tank tractor fuel tank diesel tanki thi aise do teen maine keyword bole hue hai maine abhi message me bhi dala hai.
Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Wo ek baar nahi kitni baar bola hai unko maine.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Wo kitni baar bola hai kitni baar bola hai ye thodi hota hai main ghar par chutti par aaya hua hu maine kya lena usse.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aap chutti par aaye ho to apna kaam dekho apne backend pe bol do bhai ye wala kaam kar do pehle wo ladki thi Jalandhar wali usne bewakoof bana diya teen char mahine fir isne Ujjwal ne bana diya teen char mahine main mere ko koi benefit nahi hai IndiaMART ka.
Customer: Main mere paise wapas kar do bas aap jo bhi 40000 35000 jo bhi maine diye the sare wapas kar do.
Executive: Sir thodi si background se aawaz aa rahi hai thodi si aap matlab haan aap bataiye.
Customer: Koi background se aawaz nahi sir shanti hai matlab aap ye dekho ki maine March ke mahine se aur main apna manufacturer mein monopoly item hai meri.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji.
Customer: matlab banane wale ye nahi hai ki 5000 10000 bande hai do char bande hai total.
Customer: Theek hai usse meri apni market bhi kharab ho gayi jo mere apne purane 40000 40 saal se dealer the wo kehte aap online chadh gaye ho aap IndiaMART pe bechne lage ho hamara parda khatam ho gaya ye hai unhone unhone duja duje bande hire kar liye duje bande dealer jod liye mere ko idhar se online kaam bhi nahi mila mere offline bande bhi kharab ho gaye IndiaMART ki vajah se to kitni baar samjhaya bhi aise aise karo aise aise karo koi sunta hi nahi hai.
Customer: To maine kya rehne dena mera jo 36 37000 aapne liye hai mera wapas kar do mere ko.
Executive: Sir dekhiye suniye to sir jaise aap jo bata rahe ho baat aapki ekdam sahi hai aapne kaha ki aapke hi line mein kafi sare aur bhi log hai jo same segment pe kaam kar rahe hai.
Customer: Sir jo kar rahe hai.
Executive: aap akele manufacturer ho baki aap wo wholesaler ya distributor hai aapke product line right?
Customer: Main kehta hu honge achi baat hai mere hi bande mere hi kaam kar rahe hai man lo koi dikkat nahi hai sawal ye hai agar koi mera naam lekar koi dhoonde Google pe jaye ya IndiaMART pe jaye bhi haan bhai aise hi maine jana hai ye mere ko fuel cock jana hai to wo motorcycle ka dikha raha hai aap apni taraf se mere ko lead bhej rahe ho uski kya kehte hai apni wo assembly ki spindle ki jo mere kaam ki nahi hai jo mere kaam ki lead hai wo mere ko bhejo main unse sampark karu bande hai ek bande ne thag liya 5000 piece bol ke order bol ke ek sample mangwa ke gayab ho gaya wo banda IndiaMART se to aise cheeze nahi hoti jab hum bata rahe hai bhi humko pata hai bhi kahan fault pad raha hai jab hum khud fault bata rahe hai bhi jab banda keyword hi nahi dhoond pata jab fuel cock likhte hai motorcycle ka fuel cock aa jata hai aapne keyword ka jo piche backend pe jo aapke keyword banata hai usko bahar nikalo naukri se usko usse itna keyword bhi nahi banta tractor fuel cock likhna hai bas hota kya hai keyword piche backend pe uske usme dalna hota hai bas.
Customer: Ke cheez cheez ke paise leta hai wo backend pe jo software pe kaam kar rahe hai aapke bande jisse ek keyword nahi aath no mahine se banaya gaya batao mere ko bahar nikalo unko naukri se muft ki tankha le rahe hai aap se.
Customer: Keyword dekho bhai meri baat suno che panch che keyword maine Ujjwal ko bhi diye hai us ladki ko bhi diye hai kal maine whatsapp chalo main aapko 24 ghante ka time deta hu mere keyword dalo.
Executive: Achcha 24 ghante keyword.
Executive: Tractor fuel cock wale fuel cock dal raha hai tractor fuel cock karke dal raha hai to tractor fuel call karke backend se add karwana padega wo.
Customer: Haan haan wo backend wale ko goli mar do usko backend wale ko no mahine me ho gaye mere ko bolte hue ko backend wala banda jo kaam nahi karta wo kya hai use meri baat conference me baat karwao usi mere sath ek keyword nahi use dala ja raha nikamma banda jo bhi hai aapka hota kya hai ki muli si cheez hoti hai aapka software hai na bhai hum to keyword bana nahi sakte uska piche se language programming mein aapne keyword dalna hai ek kya do minute ka kaam nahi hai usme dalne ka hum logo ko knowledge hai is cheez ki humne python padhi hui hai sara hum piche language program jante hai kya hota hai humne bataya hai ki piche se programming mein keyword add karwa do us nikamme se wohi add nahi ho raha no mahine ho gaye minte dalte ko.
Executive: Ji aapko main bada time deta dekho aaj shukrwar hai kal shanivar hai parso hai.
Customer: Mere somwar tak chadhwa do bas nahi to mere paise wapas kar do.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Wo lead mere ko mere product ki aani chahiye jo 10 lead aap dete ho roj wo mere product ki aani chahiye kisi aur ke product ki nahi aani chahiye wo chahe banda ek piece mange mere sir mathe par hai main usko bheju kya karu na karu lekin product to bole.
Executive: Achcha aapko chahiye tractor fuel cock ke chahe wo chhoti hi lead ho chahe wo kahe ki main ek piece ki chahiye right?
Customer: Main kehta hu ek banda bhi ek piece bhi dalta hai wo koi kaam to kar rahe hai na piche software kaam to chal raha hai na aaj ek mang raha hai kal ko koi 200 wala bhi aa jayega 50 wala bhi aa jayega 300 wala bhi aayega humko koi dikkat nahi hum hamara jo aap IndiaMART agar 2000 ka maal bhi ho bikwa raha hai humko koi dikkat nahi usse humko 2 lakh nahi chahiye 5000 de do.

Customer: Nahi pipe nahi banate hum hum fuel cock haan aap ye keyword add karwao uske baad do teen keyword main aur dunga wo baad me karwayenge add.
Executive: Achcha wo baad me karwaoge haan haan pehle ye karke dikhao bhi ye hota bhi hai aap se ki nahi hota.
Executive: Theek hai ji theek hai wo main baat karta hu aap bolta hu unhe aaj hi backend team ko main dalta hu ki ye teen necessary hai aaj monday tak update chahiye ispe theek.
Customer: Haan haan haan main aapko teen din ka time deta hu aap chadhwao kaam karwao somwar ab banda koi dhoonde milega tabhi jab wo dhoondega aage aayega jab wo dhoondega fuel cock aage motorcycle aa jayega agla band kar dega.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul nahi main ispe karwata hu aur kya kehte hai tab tak ke liye ye ticket band kar de raha hu monday ko main aapko samne se fir se call karta hu theek update mark kar dijiyega.
Customer: Alright alright.
Executive: Okay abhi aapke paas wo aayega feedback aayega wo meri aur aapki baato ke beech ka hoga us pe aap satisfy mark kar dijiyega.
Customer: Okay main satisfy nahi hu abhi main abhi to somwar ko aap keyword dalo fir hi hounga main.
Executive: Abhi abhi abhi jo hamari aur aapki baat hui na har baat ke baad review aata hai sir.
Customer: Wo aata hai but mera masala nahi hal hoga na main satisfy kaise hounga bhai meri jaan.
Executive: Sir dekho suniye sir jo aap aap dekho aap aapke jaise kitne phone mere ko aa chuke hai main har baar unko pyar se samjhata hu time lagata hu but aisa nahi hota bhai aap koi kaam hi na ho fir fayda kya batao mere ko.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul wo main karwa ke aapko fir main monday ko main bol raha hu main aapko samne se call karunga ek cheez ye keh raha hu jo feedback aata hai na sir wo IndiaMART ke liye nahi aata hai wo matlab mere liye aata hai ki maine aapke sath jo baat kari maine aapki aapki problem samjhi usko solve karne ki koshish ki ki nahi ki uske regarding pe aata hai sir.
Customer: Nahi ab man lo somwar tak na hui to main kisko message karunga fir main keh to raha hu main keh to raha hu main aapka maine abhi aapne ticket open kiya maine aapko call kari samne se call kari theek sir main keh raha hu ki main yaha pe alarm laga de raha hu main aapko fir se hi monday ko call karunga aapko isi time pe call kar lunga alright alright.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay okay.
summary:

- Executive will follow up on Monday.
